thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 55 of 579
thread.title: Sophie Sandelin

author: Sophie Sandelin
title: Sophie Sandelin
text: I guess i've just been screwed so many times by companies especially online that dealing with people who aren't out for ONLY their interest and money was refreshing! :) very pleased, good quality stuff too. And the times i've had to talk to customer service in the distant past, they were very accommodating and looked out for me...not common these days.
